data.title: Tour of Morava Airport in Ladjevci
data.meta_description: Ministry of Defence of the Republic of Serbia - Official Web Site
data.meta_site_name: Ministry of defence Republic of Serbia
data.text:
State Secretary at the Ministry of Defence Nenad Neric and Acting Director of Nikola Tesla Airport Sasa Vlaisavljević visited today the Morava Airport in Ladjevci near Kraljevo.

The tour of the airport building and its facilities included Zoran Ilic, Assistant Minister of Construction, Transport and Infrastructure, Nebojsa Simovic, Head of Raska district, Slobodan Jolovic, Head of Morava District, Predrag Babic, Acting Director of the Airports of Serbia Company, and Tomislav Ilic, Mayor of Kraljevo.

They discussed possibilities of opening the Morava Airport for commercial flights and the necessary funds to get started that airport in Ladjevci.
